info.name: Better Reddit Shorcuts-bar
info.description:
• Multi-row
  • Fixed bar (RES does wrong)
  • Multireddits are highlighted in bold
  • Cute :3
info.additionalInfo:
Still not perfect. CHANGELOG: 0.00001: Less dependency on RES. But it looks better with RES. NOTES:
  • Set UI > betteReddit > pinHeader to none
  • Could conflict with some subreddits
  • For now, it is only 2 rows (you can't change it)
Need updated screenshots
